A.1.2 Bibliography

This specification mentions the following documents.

Table A.1 Bibliography.

N. Feinberg, S. E. Keene, R.O. Mathews, P. T. Withington, Dylan Programming, Addison Wesley, 1997.

L. M. Shalit, The Dylan Reference Manual, Addison Wesley, 1996.
